sentences.english: Sweet potato residue is the by-product of sweet potato starch process.

sentences.english: Many Chinese believe that the best food during White Dew is sweet potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 很多中国人认为，白露时节最好的食物是红薯。

sentences.english: Fry the dried sweet potato leaves into iron boiler and pay attention to do not fry to burn.
sentences.chinese: 将干燥后的红薯叶放入铁锅中炒，注意不要炒糊焦。

sentences.english: To top off this delectable dish, serve a Two-Potato Salad With Mustard-Chive Dressing.
sentences.chinese: 搭配这款美食，需要浇了芥末撒了小香葱的红薯沙拉。

sentences.english: This weather, I just want to go Kaohong Shu.
sentences.chinese: 这样的天气里，我就是想去烤红薯。

sentences.english: Usually on the street corners you can see street peddlers selling warm baked sweet potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 在陌头的拐角处，每每会有陌头小贩在卖烤红薯。

sentences.english: Sweet potato skin contains many useful nutrients in Ankang.
sentences.chinese: 红薯皮上含有良多有益安康的养分物质。

sentences.english: Replace the nutritionally vacuous iceberg lettuce with baby spinach in tacos or mix sweet potatoes in your regular mashed potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 可代替有营养的生菜或红薯和马铃薯的混合食物。

sentences.english: The “rice” is made by mixing potatoes, sweet potatoes and plastic.
sentences.chinese: 假米由土豆，红薯和塑料混合制成。

sentences.english: I couldn't find sweet potato dumplings here.
Day air-cooled, fragrant roasts the sweet potato depth the Hefei resident's affection.
sentences.chinese: 天气凉了，香喷喷的烤红薯深受合肥市民的喜爱。

sentences.english: Production of "Phoenix" brand sweet potato products of good quality.
sentences.chinese: 生产的“凤凰”牌系列红薯产品质量优良。

sentences.english: Popular side dishes include cranberries and sweet potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 受欢迎的配菜包括小红莓和红薯。

sentences.english: Liu, GaoGu on narrow pot, sweet grass will be happy to stand in the kitchen kept.
sentences.chinese: 高家，柳细腰将红薯上锅，小草快乐地站在厨房守着。

sentences.english: The center also is engaged in developing more nutritious varieties of sweet potatoes and peanuts.
sentences.chinese: 该中心还从事开发更有营养的红薯和花生品种。
